content.raw: @{557058:095b1e12-74ed-4e20-b44f-2f0745b616e0} I just noticed that in your comment from last week \(above\) about friction properties, you mention DART. I did think that DART was going to be the default physics engine for Ignition Gazebo but noticed yesterday that all of the world files explicitly reference ODE - is this expected?
content.html: @Nate Koenig I just noticed that in your comment from last week (above) about friction properties, you mention DART. I did think that DART was going to be the default physics engine for Ignition Gazebo but noticed yesterday that all of the world files explicitly reference ODE - is this expected?
